member.name: T:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings
member.summary: Contains all core application settings. The ConfigurationManager will correct incorrect Application settings and throw an exception if an invalid configuration is set.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AutoThrottleHttpWebRequests
member.summary: Should the Crawler attempt to crawl at a rate just below what a web server will serve Discoveries at? Use this setting if you experience timeouts in downloading web site content.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.Accept
member.summary: Sets the WebClient's HttpWebRequest's 'Accept' HttpHeader to the specific value. This value mirrors Chrome's 'Accept' header value.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AcceptEncoding
member.summary: Sets the WebClient's HttpWebRequest's 'Accept-Encoding' HttpHeader to the specific value. This value mirrors Chrome's 'Accept-Encoding' header value.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AllowAutoRedirect
member.summary: Should the WebClient allow automatic redirection to another AbsoluteUri?

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.DiscoverySlidingExpirationInSeconds
member.summary: How long should a Discovery remain in the Cache before being considered for expiration?

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertDisallowedDiscoveries
member.summary: Should discovered Discovery Discoveries be submitted to the database? Set this to 'true' if it is important to know where a disallowed Discovery originated from. The default value is 'false'.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertDiscoveries
member.summary: Should discovered Discoveries be submitted to the database? Setting this to 'false' is an advanced technique and in most installations should be set to 'true'.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertCrawlRequests
member.summary: Should discovered CrawlRequests be submitted to the database? Setting this to 'false' is an advanced technique and in most installations should be set to 'true'.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.OutputWebExceptions
member.summary: Should WebExceptions be output to the Console?

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.MaximumNumberOfAutoRedirects
member.summary: The maximum number of automatic redirections allowed by the WebClient before throwing an Exception.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.ProcessDiscoveriesAsynchronously
member.summary: The CrawlRequestManager provides a thread for each Crawl thread which submits Discoveries (Files/HyperLinks/Images/WebPages) to the database asynchronously so that the WebClient associated with the Crawl thread may continue downloading without waiting for the database inserts/updates to complete. Enabling this typically improves crawling performance.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.SetRefererToParentAbsoluteUri
member.summary: Sets the 'Referer' HttpRequestHeader to the CrawlRequests's Parent's AbsoluteUri.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.ProcessCookies
member.summary: Should Cookies be processed?

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AssignCrawlRequestPrioritiesForFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [assign crawl request priorities for files]. Should File Priorities be set according to values in the Priorities table? If set to 'true', File priorities will be set according to the 'Host' of the File AbsoluteUri. If set to 'false' the File will be created as a CrawlRequest with a Priority of '0'.
member.value: true if [assign crawl request priorities for files]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AssignCrawlRequestPrioritiesForHyperLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [assign crawl request priorities for hyper links]. Should HyperLink Priorities be set according to values in the Priorities table? If set to 'true', HyperLink priorities will be set according to the 'Host' of the HyperLink AbsoluteUri. If set to 'false' the HyperLink will be created as a CrawlRequest with a Priority of '0'.
member.value: true if [assign crawl request priorities for hyper links]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AssignCrawlRequestPrioritiesForImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [assign crawl request priorities for images]. Should Image Priorities be set according to values in the Priorities table? If set to 'true', Image priorities will be set according to the 'Host' of the Image AbsoluteUri. If set to 'false' the Image will be created as a CrawlRequest with a Priority of '0'.
member.value: true if [assign crawl request priorities for images]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AssignCrawlRequestPrioritiesForWebPages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [assign crawl request priorities for web pages]. Should WebPage Priorities be set according to values in the Priorities table? If set to 'true', WebPage priorities will be set according to the 'Host' of the WebPage AbsoluteUri. If set to 'false' the WebPage will be created as a CrawlRequest with a Priority of '0'.
member.value: true if [assign crawl request priorities for web pages]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AssignEmailAddressDiscoveries
member.summary: Should EmailAddresses be assigned (parsed) from a WebPage Discovery?
member.value: true if [assign email address discoveries]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AssignFileAndImageDiscoveries
member.summary: Should Files and Images be assigned (parsed) from a WebPage Discovery?
member.value: true if [assign file and image discoveries]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.AssignHyperLinkDiscoveries
member.summary: Should HyperLinks be assigned (parsed) from a WebPage Discovery?
member.value: true if [assign hyper link discoveries]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.ClassifyAbsoluteUris
member.summary: Upon submission to the database, will AbsoluteUris be classified according to Scheme, Domain, Host and Extension?
member.value: true if [classify absolute uris]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.ConnectionString
member.summary: The ConnectionString used for connecting to the arachnode.net Database.
member.value: The connection string.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.ConsoleOutputLogsDirectory
member.summary: The UNC\relative path where console output logs should be written to disk.
member.value: The console output logs directory.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.CrawlRequestTimeoutInMinutes
member.summary: The duration until a CrawlRequest times out.
member.value: The crawl request timeout in minutes.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.CreateCrawlRequestsFromDatabaseCrawlRequests
member.summary: Should CrawlRequests stored in the database be converted to CrawlRequests for crawling?
member.value: true if [create crawl requests from database crawl requests]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.CreateCrawlRequestsFromDatabaseFiles
member.summary: Should Files stored in the database be converted to CrawlRequests for crawling?
member.value: true if [create crawl requests from database files]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.CreateCrawlRequestsFromDatabaseHyperLinks
member.summary: Should HyperLinks stored in the database be converted to CrawlRequests for crawling?
member.value: true if [create crawl requests from database hyper links]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.CreateCrawlRequestsFromDatabaseImages
member.summary: Should Images stored in the database be converted to CrawlRequests for crawling?
member.value: true if [create crawl requests from database images]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.CreateCrawlRequestsFromDatabaseWebPages
member.summary: Should WebPages stored in the database be converted to CrawlRequests for crawling?
member.value: true if [create crawl requests from database web pages]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.DesiredMaximumMemoryUsageInMegabytes
member.summary: The desired number of megabytes of RAM memory that arachnode.net will use. Try to set this to at least 1/3 of the available RAM. Higher values equal increased performance. If crawling on the database server, leave room for SQL's cache, favoring SQL's cache in the number of megabytes allocated.
member.value: The desired maximum memory usage in megabytes.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.DownloadedFilesDirectory
member.summary: The UNC/relative path where downloaded Files should be saved.
member.value: The downloaded files directory.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.DownloadedImagesDirectory
member.summary: The UNC/relative path where downloaded Images should be saved.
member.value: The downloaded images directory.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.DownloadedWebPagesDirectory
member.summary: The UNC/relative path where downloaded WebPages should be saved.
member.value: The downloaded web pages directory.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.EnableConsoleOutput
member.summary: Should program output be directed to the console? Logging to the Console is an expensive operation and should be disabled in production systems.
member.value: true if [enable console output]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.ExtractFileMetaData
member.summary: Should the FileManager extract File MetaData?
member.value: true if [extract file meta data]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.ExtractImageMetaData
member.summary: Should the ImageManager extract Image MetaData?
member.value: true if [extract image meta data]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.ExtractWebPageMetaData
member.summary: Should the WebPageManager extract WebPage MetaData? The HtmlAgilityPack is extremely RAM hungry. Setting this property to 'true' will have an adverse effect on performance.
member.value: true if [extract web page meta data]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.HttpWebRequestRetries
member.summary: The maximum number of retries that a Crawl will attempt should the WebPage not respond as a result of remote WebServer throttling.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertDisallowedAbsoluteUriDiscoveries
member.summary: Should Crawls submit DisallowedAbsoluteUri Discoveries to the database?
member.value: true if [insert disallowed absolute URI discoveries]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertDisallowedAbsoluteUris
member.summary: Should Crawls submit DisallowedAbsoluteUris to the database?
member.value: true if [insert disallowed absolute uris]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertEmailAddressDiscoveries
member.summary: Should Crawls submit EmailAddress Discoveries to the database?
member.value: true if [insert email address discoveries]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertEmailAddresses
member.summary: Should Crawls submit EmailAddresses to the database?
member.value: true if [insert email addresses]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertExceptions
member.summary: Should Crawls, et. al. submit Exceptions to the database?
member.value: true if [insert exceptions]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertFileDiscoveries
member.summary: Should Crawls submit File Discoveries to the database?
member.value: true if [insert file discoveries]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertFileMetaData
member.summary: Should the FileManager submit File MetaData to the database?
member.value: true if [insert file meta data]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertFiles
member.summary: Should the FileManager submit Files to the database?
member.value: true if [insert files]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertFileSource
member.summary: Should the FileManager submit File Sources to the database?
member.value: true if [insert file source]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertHyperLinks
member.summary: Should Crawls submit HyperLinks to the database?
member.value: true if [insert hyper links]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertHyperLinkDiscoveries
member.summary: Should Crawls submit HyperLink Discoveries to the database?
member.value: true if [insert hyper link discoveries]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertImageDiscoveries
member.summary: Should Crawls submit Image Discoveries to the database?
member.value: true if [insert image discoveries]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertImageMetaData
member.summary: Should the ImageManager submit Image MetaData to the database?
member.value: true if [insert image meta data]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertImages
member.summary: Should the ImageManager submit Images to the database?
member.value: true if [insert images]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertImageSource
member.summary: Should the ImageManager submit Image Sources to the database?
member.value: true if [insert image source]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertWebPageMetaData
member.summary: Should the WebPageManager submit WebPage MetaData to the database?
member.value: true if [insert web page meta data]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertWebPages
member.summary: Should the WebPageManager submit WebPages to the database?
member.value: true if [insert web pages]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.InsertWebPageSource
member.summary: Should the WebPageManager submit WebPage Sources to the database?
member.value: true if [insert web page source]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.MaximumNumberOfCrawlRequestsToCreatePerBatch
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of crawl requests to create per batch. The maximum number of CrawlRequests created from the CrawlRequests, Files, HyperLinks, Images and/or WebPages tables when the Engine requests CrawlRequests to crawl.
member.value: The maximum number of crawl requests to create per batch.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.MaximumNumberOfCrawlThreads
member.summary: The maximum number of crawl threads spawned by the Engine. Many ISP's limit the number of concurrent outbound connections to 10. If you find CrawRequests are being cancelled or throttled frequently reduce this number.
member.value: The maximum number of crawl threads.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.MaximumNumberOfHostsAndPrioritiesToSelect
member.summary: The maximum number of Hosts and Priorities to select for use by the PriorityQueue and the ReportingManager.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.OutputConsoleToLogs
member.summary: Should console output be redirected to logs on disk?
member.value: true if [output console to logs]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.OutputStatistics
member.summary: Should Crawl statistics be output to the console?
member.value: true if [output statistics]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.OverrideDatabaseConfigurationWithXmlConfiguration
member.summary: //ANODET: Currently in development...

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.SaveDiscoveredFilesToDisk
member.summary: Should discovered Files be saved to disk?
member.value: true if [save discovered files to disk]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.SaveDiscoveredImagesToDisk
member.summary: Should discovered Images be saved to disk?
member.value: true if [save discovered images to disk]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.SaveDiscoveredWebPagesToDisk
member.summary: Should discovered WebPages be saved to disk?
member.value: true if [save discovered web pages to disk]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.SqlCommandTimeoutInMinutes
member.summary: The duration until a SqlCommand times out. This setting determines how long the application will wait for an executing SqlCommand (StoredProcedure, etc.) before timing out.
member.value: The SQL command timeout in minutes.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.UniqueIdentifier
member.summary: Adds a suffix to the CacheKey used by the cache. If multiple instances of the Crawler are used simultaneously on the same machine in the same process, each Crawler instance should use a distinct UniqueIdentifier as the instances use a common in-memory cache for state verification.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.UserAgent
member.summary: The User-Agent HttpRequest header used to identify Crawls.
member.value: The user agent.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.ApplicationSettings.VerboseOutput
member.summary: Should console output be verbose? Verbose output sends the AbsoluteUri of eacu Discovery to the console.
member.value: true if [verbose output]; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings
member.summary: Contains all core web settings.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.CacheTimeoutInMinutes
member.summary: The maximum time in minutes that a cached Query or Hits object will remain in the Cache. This setting also controls how often the IndexSearcher will refresh, allowing new search results.
member.value: The cache timeout in minutes.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.ConnectionString
member.summary: The ConnectionString used for connecting to the arachnode.net Database.
member.value: The connection string.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.CreateCrawlRequestsForMissingFilesAndImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [create crawl requests for missing files and images].
member.value: true if [create crawl requests for missing files and images]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.DownloadedFilesVirtualDirectory
member.summary: The IIS virtual directory for the downloaded Files. The leading backslash is necessary.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.DownloadedImagesVirtualDirectory
member.summary: The IIS virtual directory for the downloaded Images. The leading backslash is necessary.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.LuceneDotNetIndexDirectory
member.summary: The UNC/relative path where the lucene.net index is located.
member.value: The lucene dot net index directory.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.MaximumPageTitleLength
member.summary: The maximum number of characters that will be displayed on Search.aspx before the title is truncated and followed by an ellipses.
member.value: The maximum length of the page title.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.MaximumNumberOfDocumentsToReturnPerSearch
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of documents to return per search.
member.value: The maximum number of Documents to return per search.

member.name: P:Arachnode.Configuration.WebSettings.PageSize
member.summary: The number of Documents shown per search result page.
member.value: The size of the page.
